# Badge

````html
<ac-badge theme="success">Ok</ac-badge>
````

## Flutuante em um bot√£o


````html
<ac-button theme="primary" fill="clear" shape="round" icon-only>
    <ac-badge theme="warning" floating>1</ac-badge>
    <i class="fa fa-bell"></i>
</ac-button>
````
